text: Samantha Jane Robson (born 22 March 1966 in Wandswoth, London) is a British actress who played WPC Vicky Hagen in The Bill from 1998 to 2001 and Sloan Peterson in Ferris Bueller. She has also appeared in the 2006 movie A Good Year. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:British actors Category:Actors from London
title: Samantha Robson
